question: If two primary spermatocytes and two primary oocytes undergo meiosis simultaneously, what will be the ratio of spermatozoa and ova produced at the end of the gametogenesis?
explanation: One primary spermatocyte produces 4 spermatozoa, so 2 produce 8. One primary oocyte produces 1 ovum, so 2 produce 2. The ratio is 8:2, which simplifies to 4:1[cite: 99, 100, 104].
